description.value: Your roar shakes the earth and splits the heavens. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Chain Lightning] as a 7th-rank innate occult spell. Any creature that critically fails its save against the spell is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] for 1 round.
